metadata.title: CVE-2022-48668 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: smb3:fix temporary data corruption in collapse range collapse range doesn'tdiscard the affected cached region so can risk temporarily corrupting thefile data. This fixes xfstest generic/031 I also decided to merge a minorcleanup to this into the same patch (avoiding rereading inode sizerepeatedly unnecessarily) to make it clearer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
